page.title: 08 THE IMPERIAL HOTEL
page.content: Mr. J Hobbs is the manager of the {Imperial Hotel}which is near{Rocquaine {Bay}.He lives in a flat with his wife and two children which is next to the Hotel. Mr Hobbs begins his day at 8 am.and his first jobs after breakfast is to organize the hotel staff of which there are a total of 28 and they come from England,Ireland and Portugal.Mr. Hobbs says that{Guernsey people do not want to work in hotels.Then he checks the cash from the tills from the day before and sorts through his letters to see if there are any hotel bookings. The hotel has 18 bedrooms when full. It is open all the year round and can take 40 guests when full.Most of the people who stay are English but some come from all over the world.
